posts.post_content:
Happy New Year to the Network 54 family

I am working on 3 projects for 2012.  American Beauty 350 No Frame, Sovereign 460 and Sweet Caporal 150 Fac 649

Here are the cards that I am looking for.  Email me at [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url] if you can help.  Thanks, Bill

Sweet Caporal 150 Fac 649
Davis
Griffith Portrait
Johnson Portrait
Killian Pitching
Lajoie Throwing
Lake NY
Mathewson White Cap
O'Leary Portrait
Schmidt Throwing

American Beauty 350 No Frame
Jennings Two hands showing
Johnson Pitching
Jordan Batting
Rucker Throwing
Wagner Bat on Right Shoulder

Sovereign 460
Camnitz Arm at Side
Chance Portrait Yellow
Chase Black Cap
Cobb Red
Evers Chicago
Gandil
Marquard Pitching
Mathewson Dark Cap
McGraw Portrait Cap
Seymour Portrait
Tinker Bat On

I hate following posts like the one above because it makes my low end T206 collection look even more low end!  I do, however, like the BST board because when the high end collectors upgrade their collections, their downgrades become my upgrades!

This year, I hope to add an SGC 10 T206 of Kid Elberfeld - Washington - Portait and perhaps another SGC 10 of Ty Cobb.

I am currently at 514 of 524.  It's a set I will never complete.

I am also working on the following basketball sets:

1948 Bowman - (Damn you, George Mikan!)
1957 Topps - (Damn you, Bill Russell!)
1961 Topps - (Damn you, Wilt Chamberlain!)

I hope everyone has a good 2012!

Email sent Bill, great subsets!

If anyone is interested I might be parting out the 649s or selling as a lot.
